content.rendered:
Directed by Matthew Warchus

Written by Roald Dahl. Dennis Kelly

Star Stephen Graham(Mr. Wormwood). Emma Thompson(Miss Trunchbull). Andrea Riseborough(Mrs. Wormwood). Lashana Lynch(Miss Honey). Alisha Weir(Matilda Wormwood). Katherine Kingsley(Evil Stepmother). Bebe Massey(Matildas Classmate). Noah Leggott(Child Ensemble). Charlie Hodson-Prior(Bruce Bogtrotter). Charlie Gordon(Child Ensemble). Serrana Su-Ling Bliss(Child Ensemble). Nick Owenford(Circus Audience). Summer Jenkins(Child Ensemble). Sindhu Vee(Mrs. Phelps). Isla Brill(Child Ensemble / Background Singer). Scarlett Weegram(Child Ensemble). Leon Ung(Matilda’s Class / Child Ensemble). Meesha Garbett(Hortensia). Rei Yamauchi Fulker(Lavender). Luke Cinque-White(Doctor). Carl Spencer(Magnus the Escapologist). Winter Jarrett-Glasspool(Amanda Thripp). Kit Cranston(Child Ensemble). Yasmin Boys(Child Ensemble). Lila McNamara(Child Ensemble). Jack Meredith(Child Ensemble). Lauren Alexandra(The Acrobat). Rudy Gibson(Matilda’s classmate / Small Boy). Miah Hasselbaink(Ensemble). Lyla Toplass(Child Ensemble). Jenny O’Leary(Miracle Parent (singing voice)). Olivia Clark(Child Ensemble). Louis Martin(Miracle Parent). Erin Rushidi(Matilda’s Classmate / Neat Girl). Sofia Weegram(Child Ensemble). Jemma Geanaus(Miracle Parent). Siu-see Hung(Miracle Parent). Imogen Darwen(Child Ensemble). Bryson Dekker(Child Ensemble). Jessie Benedick(Matilda’s Class). Abigail Climer(Nurse). Kieran Chalker(Journalist (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Tim Bevan. Eric Fellner. Jon Finn. Amelia Granger. Luke Kelly. Alex Oakley. Sarah-Jane Robinson

Production Working Title Films. Netflix. TriStar Pictures
